items.title: Winter virus season so far is not too bad, but doctors worry about suffering to come
items.description: It may feel like you are surrounded by sniffles and coughs, but flu season activity is still low in many parts of the U.S.

items.title: Lowering blood sugar can halve heart attack risk in people with prediabetes
items.description: Lowering blood sugar levels halves the likelihood of serious heart problems in people with prediabetes.
